snippet: One Egyptian was killed and six others were injured in a bomb attack on Wednesday on a security vehicle in Egypt's lawless Sinai Peninsula, near the border with Israel, security sources said....

headline.print_headline: One Killed, Six Wounded in Bomb Attack on Egyptian Security Vehicle
headline.main: One Killed, Six Wounded in Bomb Attack on Egyptian Security Vehicle

lead_paragraph: One Egyptian was killed and six others were injured in a bomb attack on Wednesday on a security vehicle in Egypt's lawless Sinai Peninsula, near the border with Israel, security sources said.
